a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share who are worried about vs. share of deaths from terrorism
Respondents who said they worried "very much" or "a great deal". Confirmed deaths, including all victims and attackers
who died because of a terrorist attack.
Share of people worried about terrorism
Data source: World Values Survey (2022); UN (2022); GTD (2022)
